character.name: Natasha
description: An <c=textBold>actual</c> hacker. Her cards often <c=keyword>exhaust after several uses</c> and <c=keyword>apply negative statuses to enemies</c>.

description.stateful: This action triggers every <c=boldPink>{{Step}}</c> of <c=boldPink>{{Steps}}</c> times this card is played (currently <c=boldPink>{{Current}}</c>/<c=boldPink>{{Steps}}</c>).
description.stateless: This action triggers every <c=boldPink>{{Step}}</c> of <c=boldPink>{{Steps}}</c> times this card is played.

Set.name: Set Uses
Set.description: Set <c=cardtrait>limited</c> uses on this card to <c=boldPink>{{Amount}}</c>.

TimesPlayed.stateful: <c=action>X</c> = Times this card was played this combat, including this play (<c=boldPink>{{Count}}</c>).
TimesPlayed.stateless: <c=action>X</c> = Times this card was played this combat, including this play.

LimitedUses.stateful: <c=action>X</c> = Times this <c=cardtrait>limited</c> card can still be played, excluding this play (<c=boldPink>{{Count}}</c>).
LimitedUses.stateless: <c=action>X</c> = Times this <c=cardtrait>limited</c> card can still be played, excluding this play.

Reprogrammed.name: Reprogrammed
Reprogrammed.description: The next <c=midrow>object</c> launched by this ship is replaced with a <c=midrow>Repair Kit</c>.

Deprogrammed.name: Deprogrammed
Deprogrammed.description: The next <c=midrow>object</c> launched by this ship is replaced with an <c=midrow>Asteroid</c>.

description.stateful: This card can be used <c=boldPink>{{Count}}</c> times this combat before it gets <c=cardtrait>exhausted</c>.
description.outOfCombat: This card can be used <c=boldPink>{{Count}}</c> times each combat before it gets <c=cardtrait>exhausted</c>.
description.withoutCard: This card can be used multiple times each combat before it gets <c=cardtrait>exhausted</c>.

condition.TimesPlayed: times this card was played this combat (including this play)

DarkWebData.name: DARK WEB DATA
DarkWebData.description: Choose a card that <c=cardtrait>exhausts</c>. Replace its <c=cardtrait>Exhaust</c> with <c=cardtrait>Limited 2</c>.

ui.title: Select a card to replace <c=cardtrait>Exhaust</c> with <c=cardtrait>Limited 2</c>, forever.

Forkbomb.name: FORKBOMB
Forkbomb.description: Once per combat, whenever your enemy gains a negative status, they gain 1 more.

Keylogger.name: KEYLOGGER
Keylogger.description: If you end your turn with more than 0 <c=energy>energy</c>, give 1 extra use to a random <c=cardtrait>limited</c> card in your hand.

NetworkComputing.name: NETWORK COMPUTING
NetworkComputing.description: Whenever you play a <c=cardtrait>limited</c> card, play it again for free (if it still has uses left). <c=downside><c=cardtrait>Limited</c> cards get 1 less use.</c>

OperationAltair.name: OPERATION ALTAIR
OperationAltair.description: Each combat, all non-<c=cardtrait>single-use</c> cards start as if they were already played once, without reducing their <c=cardtrait>limited</c> uses.

RamDisk.name: RAM DISK
RamDisk.description: <c=cardtrait>Limited</c> cards get 3 extra uses. <c=downside><c=cardtrait>Limited 1</c> now makes cards <c=cardtrait>single use</c> instead of <c=cardtrait>exhaust</c>.</c>

SecondConsole.name: SECOND CONSOLE
SecondConsole.description: Whenever you play a <c=cardtrait>limited</c> card, gain 1 <c=status>temp shield</c>.

AccessViolation.name: Access Violation
AccessViolation.description: Put all <c=cardtrait>exhausted limited</c> cards in your <c=keyword>discard pile</c>. Give them +1 use.

description.None: Launch an <c=midrow>asteroid</c> in front of the largest enemy attack targeting you.
description.A: Launch an <c=midrow>asteroid</c> in front of the largest enemy attack targeting you.
description.B: Launch a <c=midrow>random static object</c> in front of the largest enemy attack targeting you.

description.None: Trigger an enemy intent or <c=midrow>midrow object</c>.
description.A: Trigger an enemy intent or <c=midrow>midrow object</c>. <c=action>Spontaneous</c>: <c=cardtrait>Discount</c> by 1.
description.B: Trigger an enemy intent or <c=midrow>midrow object</c>.

description.None: Give +1 use to <c=cardtrait>limited</c> cards in hand.
description.A: Give +2 uses to <c=cardtrait>limited</c> cards in hand.
description.B: Give +1 use to <c=cardtrait>limited</c> cards in hand.

description.None: Add 1 of {{Count}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=E1FFCF>Natasha</c> cards to your hand.
description.A: Add 1 of {{Count}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=E1FFCF>Natasha</c> cards to your hand.
description.B: Add 1 of {{Count}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=E1FFCF>Natasha</c> cards to your hand.
